title: STAT+: FDA approves brain tumor warning on Depo-Provera label as court battle grows over side effects
description: The FDA has approved a change to the labeling for a Pfizer birth control shot that warns patients of the risk of meningioma, a type of tumor.
content: The FDA has approved a change to the labeling for a Pfizer birth control shot that warns patients of the risk of meningioma, a type of tumor.
